at the civil aerospace Medical Institute
in Oklahoma City these people are about
to experience how quickly smoke can
affect an evacuation the lights are
actual Boeing aircraft lights the
regulation says that you have to guide
people to usable exits when everything
from the four-foot level to the ceiling
is totally obscured with smoke an exit
row is identified with a different
colored light some airlines are going
with green green meeting go we've been
using red for years but the color isn't
as important is the fact that it changes
color so you know that's an exit row
when there is smoke on board it is so
toxic but a few breaths can lead to
unconsciousness the key to staying alive
is to evacuate the plane as quickly as
possible we've got a lot of smoke in
here now that's the whole reason you
want the lights obviously near the floor
that's where the air stays clear the
longest okay let's go ahead and evacuate
let's go ahead and go there you go the
evacuation is a race against time
if this was a real situation they may
only have 90 seconds before the effects
of the fire becomes a serious threat to
their survival
step out sit down

nearly half of these people did not make
it off the plane in time it was
confusing I lost sight of my my exits
once I got to the very back to go up the
stairs completely lost where I was at
one point I could see nothing in front
of me and there had been somebody in
front of me then she disappeared and I
had no no point of reference and it was
a little scary I couldn't see the floor
I couldn't see the seats i couldnt see
the staircase in front of me it was
blinding I didn't find a cure because I
knew it wasn't I knew it wasn't real but
I would imagine it for a real situation
that might be a little bit of panic
going on so before you even sit down
there is one thing you should always do
that could help you find your exit in
the presence of smoke I try and count
how many seat rows I am from the exit in
front of me and from the exit behind me
in the event of smoke or in the event
that the emergency lighting fails and
it's and it's very dark because I know
the number of seed rows I can feel my
way to an exit by canning the seat bags
I'll know when I've reached the exit row
